description: Renames a dimension in the data cube while preserving all other properties.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The current name of the dimension. Fails with a `DimensionNotAvailable` error if the specified dimension does not exist.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: A new Name for the dimension. Fails with a `DimensionExists` error if a dimension with the specified name exists.

returns.description: The data cube with the renamed dimension. The old name can not be referenced any longer.

DimensionNotAvailable.message: A dimension with the specified name does not exist.

DimensionExists.message: A dimension with the specified name already exists.
